source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_00<tab>Broken Mountain has something urgent to discuss with you.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ブロンズレイクのブロークン・マウンテンは、冒険者に話があるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_01<tab>Broken Mountain, impressed with your progress, gives word that the Maelstrom is once again in need of extra bodies to aid in another operation against the beast tribes. Wheiskaet and Curious Gorge have visited Camp Bronze Lake seeking volunteers, and have asked for you by name. Speak with Curious Gorge to hear what it is Limsa Lominsa requires.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_01<tab>冒険者のもとに、黒渦団の新たな協力要請があるようだ。キャンプ・ブロンズレイクの「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_02<tab>Wheiskaet informs you that Maelstrom scouts have reported that kobolds of the 179th Order are tirelessly producing bombs in preparation for an all-out assault on Camp Bronze Lake. Maelstrom troops hope to intercept the bombs at Zelma's Run before they can do any damage, and Wheiskaet asks the aid of the two fiercest warriors he knows. Once again, Curious Gorge is afraid of his inner beast taking hold, especially in such a confined area, but Broken Mountain insists that this will be the ideal situation for Gorge to establish his dominance over the beast within. Curious Gorge asks to be alone and leaves, while Wheiskaet gives you the details of the Maelstrom operation. Speak with the despondent Curious Gorge once more before heading off to Zelma's Run and see if he can be convinced to join in on the fight.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_02<tab>冒険者は、キュリアス・ゴージとともに、第179洞穴団の迎撃作戦に参加することになった。キャンプ・ブロンズレイクの「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_03<tab>You find Curious Gorge looking crestfallen in one of the camp's hot springs. He admits that his brother is right, and that the correct path is plain, but can't seem to shake his fear of being overcome by the inner beast. He comes up with a last, desperate strategy: you must /slap him with all the strength you can muster, hopefully driving the cowardice from him for good.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_03<tab>キュリアス・ゴージは不安を抱いているようだ。彼を励ますために、キャンプ・ブロンズレイクの「キュリアス・ゴージ」に、エモート「平手打ち」をしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_04<tab>Your slap rouses Curious Gorge out of his slump, and he stands straight as if a warrior reborn. Determined to show the kobolds no quarter, he rushes to meet the storm captain at Zelma's Run. Follow him and rendezvous with the rest of the troops. Speak with the storm captain when you are ready to start the Maelstrom's next operation.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_04<tab>キュリアス・ゴージに平手打ちをした。高地ラノシアのゼルマ渓谷前にいる「黒渦団の大甲士」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at the entrance to Zelma's Run to see the same storm captain from your operation against the Serpent Reavers along with two other Maelstrom troops and Curious Gorge, who is dressed proudly in his warrior's garb. You have been assigned to intercept the 179th Order kobolds on the east side of the valley. Ready your axe and speak with the Maelstrom troop at your assigned area, but be on the lookout for any signs of kobolds.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_05<tab>コボルド族の迎撃作戦が開始された。ゼルマ渓谷の東側で任務にあたっている「黒渦団の兵卒」と話して、現れた第179洞穴団を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_06<tab>In his haste, the storm private assigned as your partner falls victim to a kobold ambush. When you run to his aid, the kobolds attempt to swarm you and the storm private, but your axe cuts them down one after the other. With the kobolds of the 179th Order slain or scattered, check on the storm private to see that his wounds are not severe.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_06<tab>第179洞穴団を討伐した。ゼルマ渓谷の東側にいる「黒渦団の兵卒」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_07<tab>The storm private's wounds are but light, and there are no remaining kobolds in sight. The defense of the eastern side of Zelma's Run is a success. Check with Curious Gorge to the west for news of their progress.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_07<tab>第179洞穴団の討伐作戦を成功させた。ゼルマ渓谷の西側で作戦にあたる「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_08<tab>It seems Curious Gorge and the other Maelstrom troops had no trouble in intercepting and dispatching the kobolds on the western side of Zelma's Run. The storm captain gives particular credit to Curious Gorge's ferocity in battle, and promises to give high praise in his report to Maelstrom Command. After the others return home, Curious Gorge tells you he was finally able to fight with abandon without succumbing to his inner beast. Nevertheless, he still doubts his own ability to maintain control in a more pitched battle. Curious Gorge returns to Camp Bronze Lake to rest, and asks you to give word of your victory to Broken Mountain upon your return.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_08<tab>キュリアス・ゴージは、討伐作戦を成功させたにもかかわらず、弱点を克服した確信を持てないようだ。キャンプ・ブロンズレイクの「ブロークン・マウンテン」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_09Broken Mountain is pleased that his brother was able to fight to his fullest, but disheartened by the news of his brother's continuing self-doubt. There is little time to consider the matter, however, as Wheiskaet brings news that Storm Marshal Slafyrsyn is seeking the aid of capable warriors to help defend Limsa Lominsa from the Sahagin menace. Broken Mountain suggests that if you were to succeed in this operation, it might lift the reputation of the warriors out of obscurity and into Eorzean history books. Continue your training in preparation for what promises to be the most critical test of your strength yet.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Broken Mountain upon reaching level 60.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SEQ_09ブロークン・マウンテンに報告した。近く、サハギン族が大規模な戦闘を仕掛けてくる気配があるという。サハギン族部隊との戦闘に備えて、さらに鍛練を積んでおこう。

※戦士のレベルが60以上になると、キャンプ・ブロンズレイクのブロークン・マウンテンから次の戦士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・ブロンズレイクのキュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge again.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_01<tab>キャンプ・ブロンズレイクでキュリアス・ゴージと再び話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_02<tab>Rouse Curious Gorge's courage with a /slap.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_02<tab>キャンプ・ブロンズレイクのキュリアス・ゴージに「平手打ち」をする

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the storm captain at Zelma's Run.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_03<tab>ゼルマ渓谷前の黒渦団の大甲士と話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the storm private and slay any kobolds that appear.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_04<tab>黒渦団の兵卒と話して現れた第179洞穴団を討伐

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_05<tab>Rescue the storm private.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_05<tab>黒渦団の兵卒を救助する

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_06<tab>ゼルマ渓谷のキュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_07<tab>Report to Broken Mountain at Camp Bronze Lake.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_TODO_07<tab>ブロークン・マウンテンに報告

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I can see the power in your stride, and feel the inner beast raging within you. You will need such strength, for your next trial is at hand.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000来たか、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
さらに肉体を鍛え上げてきたようだな。
全身からみなぎる力と、熱き「原初の魂」を感じるぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001<tab>Wheiskaet and my brother are here looking for more fighters to supplement the undermanned Maelstrom troops in a new operation, and they've asked for <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> by name. Seek them out if you wish to raise your axe once more against the beast tribes.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001ちょうどヴェイスケート殿と弟が、こちらに来ていてな。
どうやら、黒渦団から新たな協力要請が舞い込んだらしい。
詳しい話を聞きに行こうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>My wounds are healed, but I fear I may still be in need of training...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>怪我は治ったが、温泉には通ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_009<tab>It seems the Maelstrom is in need of aid once again. Ask Wheiskaet and my brother for the details.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_009黒渦団から、新たな協力要請が舞い込んだらしい。
詳しい話を聞きに行こうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_008<tab>I would ask you and Curious Gorge to aid the Maelstrom once again. Go to Camp Bronze Lake for more details.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_008キュリアス・ゴージとお前に、黒渦団の依頼を託したい。
詳しい話は、キャンプ・ブロンズレイクでしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_009<tab>I need the aid of a couple good axes once again.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_009キュリアス・ゴージとお前に、黒渦団の依頼を託したい。
みんなが揃ったら、説明を始めよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Brother!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab>お、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に、兄者！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011<tab>The Maelstrom is once again in need of support, is it not? Pray tell us what it is they require.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011またも黒渦団から、応援要請が入ったそうではないか。
依頼の詳細を聞かせてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_012<tab>Very well, now that everyone is here. Scouts have reported increased activity among the kobolds. The 179th Order seems to be producing explosives day and night in preparation for an all-out assault. From all indications, they aim to attack this very camp.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_012斥候部隊から、コボルド族に動きありとの報せが入った。
第179洞穴団が大量の爆弾を荷車に詰め込み、出撃準備中らしい。
狙いは、キャンプ・ブロンズレイクと予想される。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_013<tab>The Maelstrom's strategy is to intercept the bombs near Zelma's Run. Camp Bronze Lake is a haven for wounded soldiers, and its defense is one of our top priorities. If we had two legendary warriors by our side, our success would be all but assured.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_013要請は、ゼルマ渓谷での迎撃作戦への協力だ。
傷病兵が多数いる、このキャンプを護らねばならん……。
その要として、ふたりの「戦士」に参加してほしいとのことだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_014<tab>Zelma's Run is barely wide enough for one cart to ride abreast... If I were to lose control, none would be able to escape the beast's wrath...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_014ゼルマ渓谷は、荷馬車がすれ違えないほど細い道だ。
そんなところで、またオラが「原初の魂」に飲まれたら、
部隊の仲間がどうなっちまうことやら……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_015<tab>On the contrary, Brother, this battle will give you the chance to once again assert your dominance over the beast within.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_015だからこそ、おまえが「原初の魂」を、
ねじ伏せられる可能性が高まるのだぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_016<tab>This is what you spoke of earlier, is it not? To tame the inner beast by devoting yourself to the defense of your allies...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_016おまえが先日言っていた、仲間を護ろうとする決意が、
「原初の魂」を手懐ける、という話か？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_017<tab>Brother, if my theory turns out to be true, then control is within your grasp. As long as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is at your back, there is naught to fear.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_017そう、この仮説を立証してもらいたいのだ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>も同行していれば、安心だろう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_018<tab>Will you run away again? You <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> that the path you wish to walk, the path of the warrior, does not lie down that road.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_018……弟よ、まだ逃げるのか？
自ら一歩を踏み出さなければ、夢にはたどりつけないぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_020<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_020<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>Say no more... Please, leave me to my thoughts.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020わかってる……。
ちょっと、ひとりで頭を冷やすだけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_025<tab>Well, we've not much time for hesitation. The storm captain awaits near Zelma's Run and will be departing shortly. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if you decide to join the fight, pray tell Curious Gorge─if anyone can rouse him from his slump, it's you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_025作戦に参加するなら、ブロンズレイク側のゼルマ渓谷前にいる、
「黒渦団の大甲士」に名乗りを上げろ。
「キュリアス・ゴージ」にも、そう伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029<tab>My brother is right... It's <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> who's holding us back...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029兄者の言うとおりだ……。
オラの目標と、兄弟の目標を遠ざけてるのはオラ自身だ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_029<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, as a fellow warrior, give my brother strength.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_029<tab>同じ戦士として、君が弟の背中を押してやってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_029<tab>The storm captain awaits at the entrance to Zelma's Run. Please, try once more to convince Curious Gorge before you depart.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_029作戦に参加するなら、ブロンズレイク側のゼルマ渓谷前にいる、
「黒渦団の大甲士」に名乗りを上げろ。
キュリアス・ゴージにも、そう伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>My apologies for causing worry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. My brother is right...it's up to <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> to walk the path of might. I know that, but still I cower before the beast within...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030……心配させちまって、悪いな。
確かに兄者の言うとおり、一歩をふみださなきゃなんねえ……。
……だが、また「原初の魂」に飲まれやしないかと不安で。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>But a true warrior faces his fears, axe in hand, right!? Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, remind me what it's like to scoff at my enemies' feeble blows! Awaken your inner beast and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>slap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> the fear right out of me!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031それでも、オラはやっぱり「戦士」として前に進みてえ！
だから頼む……オラを「平手打ち」して、
オラの中から、不安を追い出してくれ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040<tab>Do it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I expect no less than a slap that would crumble mountains!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040オラはやっぱり「戦士」として前に進みてえ！
だから頼む……オラを「平手打ち」して、
オラの中から、不安を追い出してくれ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_041<tab>Godsdamn, what a blow! That's the stuff warriors are made of, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank you... I'll dominate the beast within, and our axes will stand indomitable against those bloody kobolds!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_041……くっ、効いたぜ。
「原初の魂」を手懐けて、オメと肩を並べて戦うのが、
今のオラの小さな夢なんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_042<tab>Our enemies will feel the full force of my fury, and will not step one ilm into this camp! Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we mustn't keep the storm captain waiting!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_042よし、オラはこの戦いに全力で取り組むぞ！
気前のいい温泉の傷病兵たちを、護り抜いてみせる！
さあ……ゼルマ渓谷にいる隊長さんの所に行こう！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_049<tab>I have not seen my brother in such high spirits since the incident in Wineport. Whatever you said to him seems to have worked.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_049弟が、ついに決意したか。
君のおかげだ、弟をよろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_049<tab>Fight well, and show those kobolds no quarter!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_049<tab>健闘を祈る……！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_048<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, one day I hope to fell a beast such as the one you battled at Abalathia's Spine. For that, my axe needs practice. The kobolds shall feel the full force of my fury at last! Hurry, we must report to the storm captain at Zelma's Run!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_048オメと肩を並べて強大な敵を倒すのが、オラの夢だ……。
だから、オラはこの戦いに全力で取り組むぞ！
さあ……ゼルマ渓谷にいる隊長さんの所に行こう！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_049<tab>The kobolds will scurry in fear before the wrath of the warrior! They won't dare to get within a malm of this camp again!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_049オラは、この戦いに全力で取り組む……。
気前のいい温泉の傷病兵たちを、護り抜いてみせる……！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_049<tab>With Curious Gorge by our side, victory is all but assured. I daresay the kobolds won't have the courage to face him again!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_049キュリアス・ゴージ殿が一緒なら、安心であります。
先の作戦でも、彼に助けられたのであります！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_049<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it is an honor to fight with you again! Let's show those kobolds what for!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_049先の作戦でも、あなたに同行していました。
また、ご一緒できるとは光栄です。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that both you and Curious Gorge will be aiding us brings me comfort. Camp Bronze Lake could not ask for a more stalwart defense.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_050再び、加勢いただきありがとうございます。
今回は、「戦士」がふたりも本作戦に参加してくれることを、
心から歓迎しますよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_051<tab>Our strategy is to intercept the kobolds at two separate locations in Zelma's Run. We'll split into two groups, with one warrior protecting each one.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_051二本に別れたゼルマ渓谷での迎撃作戦では、
二分した部隊の双方に、護りの要が必要になります。
もちろん、その要とは「戦士」である、あなた方です。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we'll be dispatched to the eastern side. Nary a single kobold will make it through with your fury alongside us!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_052)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
ふたたび共闘できることを光栄に思います！
渓谷「東側」は、我々で守り抜きましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_053<tab>Curious Gorge, we'll be in charge of the western side's defense. I've seen you crush kobolds under your axe before─today shall be no different!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_053キュリアス・ゴージ殿は、自分と同じ隊であります。
以前のコボルド族との戦いでも、助けていただきました。
ともに、渓谷の西側にて迎撃にあたります。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_054<tab>Once the 179th Order have run home with their tails between their legs, we will rendezvous to the north. May your axes strike true! Dismissed!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_054第179洞穴団の迎撃に成功したら、そのまま進み、
ゼルマ渓谷の北側で合流……戦況を確認します。
それでは、作戦開始！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_060<tab>What in the seven hells are you doing <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_060<tab>オメの担当は、こっちじゃねえぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_060<tab>With Curious Gorge here, there's no need for worry!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_060こちらは、キュリアス・ゴージ殿がいるので、
ご心配には及ばないであります！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_060<tab>We've managed to beat them back, for now... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, support the troops to the east!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_060こちらはなんとか凌いでいますから……
貴方は、渓谷の「東側」にて迎撃にあたってください。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_060<tab>Godsdammit... I walked right into their ambush...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_060<tab>うう……第179洞穴団に不意を打たれました……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_070<tab>That was too bloody close... Good thing the kobolds didn't count on <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> showing up. It looks like the eastern side is clear. Curious Gorge and the others may need our help─hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_070危ないところを、ありがとうございます……！
どうやら、こちらの敵襲は、ひと段落したようですね。
西側のキュリアス・ゴージさんたちと合流しましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_080<tab>I am glad you've returned to us hale and whole. The kobolds barely put up a fight.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_080ご苦労さまです。
東側の作戦も成功したようですね。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_080<tab>The kobolds won't dare to cross through Zelma's Run after today. Come, let us inform the others at Camp Bronze Lake.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_080作戦は成功だ。
現地で、みんなに報告しようぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_080<tab>Curious Gorge fought like a warrior possessed! I could feel his fury flowing through my axe, as well!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_080キュリアス・ゴージ殿の戦いぶりは、まさしく英雄でした！
自分の戦意まで高揚するほどであります。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_080<tab>If not for your timely arrival, who knows what the kobolds would have done with me? Once again, I owe you my life.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598PC_000_080過酷な戦いでしたが……
あなたのおかげで生き残れました！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_080<tab>There are no kobolds in sight of the camp, which means the operation must have been a success. Talk to my brother to see how he fared.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_080第179洞穴団の迎撃作戦は成功したようだな。
弟の様子を現地で確認してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_080<tab>Was the operation a success? Check on Curious Gorge.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_080第179洞穴団の迎撃作戦は、成功したか。
キュリアス・ゴージの様子を確認してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_081<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my apologies, but it seems the kobolds couldn't wait for you. Camp Bronze Lake has naught to fear from the 179th Order anymore!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_081オメも無事だったか！
キャンプ・ブロンズレイクは護りぬけたな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_082<tab>Curious Gorge's axe was like a whirlwind, strewing the kobolds in every which direction! His courage carried us all through battle unharmed.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SOLDIER00598CG_000_082キュリアス・ゴージ殿の戦いぶりは、まさしく英雄でした！
自分の戦意まで高揚するほどであります。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_083<tab>Without these two warriors on our side, I have no doubt the kobolds would have overwhelmed us. I will be submitting a detailed report of your heroism to Wheiskaet and Maelstrom Command. You have all fought bravely today─let us return home for well-deserved rest!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CAPTAIN00596_000_083本作戦の功労者は、まさしく、あなたたちふたりです。
黒渦団にもヴェイスケート殿にも、詳しく報告しておきますよ！
……これにて作戦は終了です、帰還しましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_085<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I can scarce remember the last time I fought as I did today. I swung my axe with abandon, but I was free from the inner beast's grasp.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_085……今回、オラは全力を出して突き進んだ。
だけど「原初の魂」に飲み込まれずに、戦い抜けたぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_086<tab>It was just as my brother said. By pouring my strength into the defense of my allies, the beast within was tamed!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_086兄者の言うとおり、仲間を護るため覚悟を決めたら、
「原初の魂」を手懐けることができたみてぇだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_087<tab>...However, kobolds are hardly a true test of one's prowess. If the fight had been against a more worthy foe, or if the circumstances had been more dire...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_087でも、今回は敵が思いの外、弱かっただけなのかもしれねえ。
恐ろしいほどの強敵が相手だったら、どうなるか……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_088<tab>Although today's battle was heartening, it's too early to say I've subdued the beast. I'll return to Camp Bronze Lake to rest─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let my brother know of our victory here.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_088まだまだ、弱点を克服したとは言い切れねえ気がするんだ。
オラは、このまま帰る。
兄者には、オメから報告してくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_090<tab>It's too early to say I'm in full control of my inner fury... The beast slumbers within me still, of that I'm certain.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_CURIOUSGORGE_000_090<tab>まだまだ、弱点を克服したとは言い切れねえ気がするんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_090<tab>Your victory is great news to us all. Broken Mountain is eager to hear of his brother's performance in the battle.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_090作戦は成功したようだな。
キュリアス・ゴージの状況も含めて、
ブロークン・マウンテンにも報告してやってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_091<tab>The storm captain has already sent his report of your impressive feats. Broken Mountain will be eager to hear of his brother's heroism.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_091作戦は成功したようだな。
キュリアス・ゴージの状況も含めて、
ブロークン・マウンテンにも報告してやってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_090<tab>It seems your victory was well earned. What of my brother? Was he able to fight without succumbing to his inner fury?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_090<tab>……そうか、弟は「原初の魂」に飲み込まれず戦いぬけたか。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_091<tab>Ah... So even with today's victory, he yet dreads the consequences were he to lose control. Still, it is only through the strength of his own will that he may dispel the fog of self-doubt.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_091それでも、いまだ弟は確信を持てずにいるのだな……。
だが、弟の胸中にたちこめる暗雲をかち割るのは、
弟自身が振るう斧だけだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_092<tab>Unfortunately, the beast tribes won't wait for Curious Gorge's epiphany. Storm Marshal Slafyrsyn has sent word that he requires a warrior's strength to aid in another Maelstrom defensive.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_092だが、時間の余裕もない……。
実は、黒渦団軍令部総長のエインザル大甲将から、
近く「戦士」の力を借りたい、という打診を受けている。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_093<tab>As you already know, kobolds aren't the only nuisances we have to contend with.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_093お前たちは、コボルド族の侵攻を阻止したが、
戦線はここひとつではないのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_094<tab>The Sahagin have taken advantage of the distraction caused by our focus on the kobolds to launch an offensive against the tidegates.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_094特に、コボルド族の攻勢を好機と捉えたのだろう……
サハギン族が南北防波壁の突破を狙っているらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_095<tab>With the bulk of Maelstrom forces tied up with the kobold threat, we can ill afford to send any men to defend the gate near Camp Skull Valley, leaving us wide open to the Sahagin threat.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_WHEISKAET_000_095しかし、黒渦団はコボルド族の対応で手いっぱいで、
スカルバレーの防波壁を防衛する戦力がさけないようだ。
……リムサ・ロミンサ、最後の防衛戦ということになる。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_096<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if the strength of a warrior were to see the people of Limsa Lominsa safely through this storm, then mayhap the glory of our ancestors would be restored, and all across Eorzea would know of us as guardians, instead of brutes.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_096だが、「戦士」の力で、この危機を乗り越えられたら……。
リムサ・ロミンサの民が救われることはもちろん、
「戦士」の名もエオルゼアに轟くことだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_097<tab>However, it saddens me to say we cannot depend on my brother to be ready to shoulder such a weight. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, when the time comes, you must needs be ready to take on the task alone.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_097仮に弟の態勢が整わなければ、
君だけを頼ることになるかもしれん。
……心して、備えておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_098<tab>In the meantime, pray tell me of your battle at Zelma's Run. Recall the ferocity with which you fought, and lose yourself in the memories of your fight.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_098ところで、君の今回の戦いは、どうだったかな？
激戦の記憶を呼び覚まし、その戦いぶりを聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100<tab>As before, your inner beast is roused, and another technique of eld is at your disposal. Your progress is encouraging. Continue on this path, continue to challenge the limits of your mind and body, and victory in the battles to come is assured.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100……やはり、激戦をきっかけに「原初の魂」が震えたようだな。
この調子で、君が成長していけば、次の作戦も安泰だ。
ぜひ己の限界に挑み、さらに肉体を鍛えておいてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWAR580_00598_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
